_header: Jesu called together him self / All his Apostles twelve
_description: Gospel for Thursday after Whit Sunday, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ihesu calde to geder him selueAlle hise Apostles
                    twelue…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffrom þat peyne he vs schyldeÞat was boren of Marie
                    Mylde. Amen.

Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
